characteristicEvaluation.characteristic: Active and coming out of the ground
Dew on the cob-webs in the morning

characteristicEvaluation.characteristic: Leaves broaden exposing more surface area

characteristicEvaluation.characteristic: Psuedo-migration, to head towards direction where rain is coming from
